titles: A journey to London in the year 1698 after the ingenuous method of that made by Dr. Martin Lyster to Paris in the same year, &c. / written originally in French by Monsieur Sorbiere and newly translated into English.
author: King, William, 1663-1712.
Sorbière, Samuel, 1615-1670. Relation d'un voyage en Angleterre.
publisher: Printed and sold by A. Baldwin ...,
notes: Fictiously attributed to Sorbière but written by William King.  Cf. DNB.
Satire on Lister's work: Journey to Paris in the year 1698.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Lister, Martin, 1638?-1712. --  Journey to Paris in the year 1698.
